DOC.detailed_description: The current study aim investigate beneficial effect motivational intervention promote exercise habit patient psychosis . Outpatients recruit randomized 12-week motivational intervention program . They assess clinical symptom , cognitive function , physical fitness , quality life . All patient cognitive function assessment baseline , 12 week completion program 6 month . The primary hypothesis current study motivational intervention help patient develop exercise habit patient early psychosis .
